Hi Jamie,

Sure, confirming we have applied the same functionality of the contact form.

Hi Joel,

Thanks - That way better. Can you please make sure the same functionality is applied to the Property Enquiries form? The field is called: Referring Page / Lot Number 😀

Hi Jamie,

Sorry about that. Thanks for the clarification. We have updated the script so it will get the current page they are in. 
Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Joel.

I think we've got ur wires crossed a little.

To be clear, the referring page name field was added so that we can identify on which page the user completed the form. The reason for this is that we have embedded the same general enquiries form on multiple pages.

So for example if the user is on the contact page and completes the general enquiry form then the referring page name field would be populated with Contact Us.

Does that make sense?

Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web http://creativegenerals.com.au/
// linkedin creative-generals

Hi Jamie,

I think what happen here is that. You have submitted an entry (ID 657) and redirect you to thank you page (https://visitlatitude25.com.au/thank-you/?Form_Name=General-Enquiries). And then you clicked the contact menu so the thank you page becomes your referring page (https://visitlatitude25.com.au/thank-you/?Form_Name=General-Enquiries)

Hope that make sense? and let me know if you need me to make some adjustments on the referring page.

Hi Joel,

Somehow the referring page has been logged as the confirmation thank you page…

What are your thoughts here?



Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web http://creativegenerals.com.au/

Hi Jamie,

All good now, I have filtered the javascript that if ever the referrer field exists on a page, it will add referrer value on the field.

if ( $('input#field_s6mxg').length ) {
$('input#field_s6mxg').val('<?php echo $_SERVER['HTTP_REFERER'];?>');
}

Hope that make sense.

Hi Joel,

What method have you used to included the php and javascript code to the contact page?

This form sits on multiple page hence the need for the referring page field.

Is there a nice and easy way to include the code everywhere this form sits?

Kind Regards,
Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

// mobile 0423 592 912
// email jamie@creativegenerals.com.au
// web http://creativegenerals.com.au/

Hi Jamie,

Cool! I have setup a php and javascript in the contact page. It will input the page referrer on the field once the page is loaded. We could disable the first thing I did (IP Address, User-Agent (Browser/OS), Referrer.).

Regarding Noted on the wpperk service stuff.

Hi Joel,

Does it have to show all three? I'll have to check with the client that the additional form data doesn't get in the way.

Also, I need to remind you that we're white labelling the WP Perk Service so ultimate discretion is required in all work you do for us. If you're testing forms the please use support@creativegenerals.com.au

Kind Regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Creative Generals

Please see the attached. It will include the IP Address, User-Agent (Browser/OS), Referrer.
If this is ok for you I will delete the "Referring Page Name"? Cheers!

Subject: General Enquiries Form submitted on Latitude25
First Name
Bob
Last Name
Cole
Email
rfcole@bigpond.net.au
Phone Number
0407173690
Message
My wife and I visited L25, Hervey Bay recently and had a tour of the facilities. We were quite impressed and will seriously consider a move within the next year or two.
We have been browsing the many floorplans and like the Franklin MK2 on site 186. What we don't like is the listed price of $655k. I guess this is because of its proximity to the clubhouse and the lake. Is this negotiable? Alternatively, will this plan be available in a future release at a more reasonable price? Ok would be hoping for sub $600k.
Any help appreciated...
Cheers
Bob
Referring Page Name
[post_title]
Address
21 Curtain Rd Pie Creek 4570
